file_content.text: You have done well, my Hand. The Empire begins to realize our vision.
We have made great progress in the months since Eradication Day. But now we march to war, and your place is with Imperial Intelligence.
As you wish, my lord. How shall I proceed?
My lord, I did as you said, but... what's the point of antagonizing the Republic?
Why are we going to war?
My ascension revealed much to me. This conflict cannot be stopped; therefore, we shall bring this galaxy to the brink of destruction... and recreate it.
You made me your Hand. Let me serve without the interference of others.
My place is at your side.
You are the vessel of my will. There shall be no interference.
Go to headquarters. Keeper has proposed a mission; shape it to our desire.
